HotelDescriptiveContent.HotelName: JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Exceptional event menus with in door and out door beachfront meeting facilities with daylight

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Extensive meeting venues, conference rooms and seminar space in luxurious Phuket Khao Lak Thailand

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Phuket Khao Lak accommodations with free high speed wireless Internet for business meeting traveler

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Additional amenities include spacious rooms, top restaurants and bars, Quan Spa, gym and large pool

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Comprehensive meeting facilities complemented by expert catering and audiovisual resources

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Special events and team buildings CSR in impressive settings with unique location and architecture

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Each luxurious guest accommodation includes a generous sitting area and individual balcony / terrace

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Pool access rooms allow guests direct private access to the 16,000 square meter lagoon-shaped pool

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: 40-inch wall-mounted LCD TV with cable and satellite channels, jack pack plug and play adapter

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Free high speed Internet access in all rooms and meeting rooms, wireless Internet throughout resort

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Work desk, coffee and tea making facility, oversized bath tub and shower, separate toilet

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: DVD player, IDD smart touch screen telephone, voice mail, electronic in-room safe, refrigerator

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Discover the treasures of Khao Lak at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa in Phang Nga, Phuket

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Travel to Phuket Khao Lak to relax or unwind with family and friends or experience local attractions

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: 70 min north of Phuket Airport by car, directly on white sandy Khuk Khak Beach with fabulous sunsets

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Beach resort near Phuket HKT Airport with vast landscaped area, ideal as meeting and event venue

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Pristine white sand beach stretches for miles, melting into the exquisite azure water of Andaman Sea

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: A hidden paradise of sun, sea, sand, lush tropical greenery, granite mountains, stunning waterfalls

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Khao Lak hotel near HKT Phuket Airport is perfect for weddings, social events and team buildings

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Ideal accommodations for overseas guests visiting Phuket Khao Lak Thailand for weddings or meetings

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Khao Lak hotel offers event coordination and unique culinary choices near Phuket HKT Airport

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Great hotel amenities, one of the largest swimming pools in Asia, fitness gym, restaurants and bars

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Outstanding catering capabilities for weddings, social events, theme parties and team buildings

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Skilled meeting planners to coordinate out of the ordinary, memorable and successful events

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Luxury Phuket Khao Lak beach front resort, all rates come with free Internet access in rooms and throughout the resort

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Free Internet access, business center, early check-in/ late check out lounge, kids club, amazing sandy beach, longest swimming pool in Southeast Asia

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Flexible meeting facilities and services complemented by Marriott's renowned meeting expertise, out of the ordinary meetings, team buidlings

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Discover the treasures of Khao Lak at JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa, a hidden paradise of sun, sea and sand, as well as lush tropical greenery, granite mountains and waterfalls. It is the ideal venue for vacations, incentives, meetings or weddings.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Discover the treasures of Khao Lak at one of Marriott Thailand's flagship properties, the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa,recipient of the 2010 Conde Nast World's Top New Hotels award.Its pristine white sandy beach stretches for miles,melting into the exquisite azure waters of the Andaman Sea.Khao Lak in Phang Nga province near Phuket is a hidden paradise of sun,sea and sand,as well as lush tropical greenery,granite mountains and stunning waterfalls. Located just over one hours drive from Phuket Airport,the vast landscaped area within the resort grounds and Southeast Asia's longest swimming pool make the resort an ideal venue for vacations,events,team buildings,incentives or weddings. At JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa, it is our mission to make every trip a pleasure and the experience of a lifetime. Enjoy amenity-filled guest rooms,superb dining,unique meeting facilities and our time-honored Spirit to Serve philosophy. For more information please mail to bookmarriott@marriotthotels.com

Description.Name: HWS Header Tag
Description.Text: Your Dream Oasis, where Nature and Luxury combine...

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: Discover the JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort and Spa - a hidden paradise of sun, sea and sand, as well as lush tropical greenery, granite mountains and stunning waterfalls. Just over a 1 hour drive north from Phuket International Airport in Phang Nga province

Description.Name: Number of Food and Beverage Outlets
Portable play yard-type crib with coverplay

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Authentic northern and traditional Thai cuisine with indoor seating featuring sunken seating area. Also outside seating by the show lagoon or on the poolside.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Modern Japanese cuisine at its best. Dine indoors and choose from the sushi bar or live teppanyaki station or dine outdoors overlooking the main swimming pool.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Offers signature sandwiches, light savory fare, ice-cream and pastries.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Elegant and stylish bar with a fabulous view of our 16,000 sq meter lagoon-shaped pool and surroundings.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Lounge in the sun and relax as you enjoy light appetizers, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. The best local ingredients are used to create signature cocktails for guests to enjoy at the Infinity Pool Bar.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Restaurant and pub with live band

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A well know Italian restaurant in Bang Niang Thailand. Imported wines and beers to home made pastas and desserts.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Buffet breakfast, dinner and a la carte all day, showcasing local, regional and international cuisine using live cooking presentations. Indoor and outdoor seating. Overlooks the Andaman Sea.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Delicious fresh fish every night, king prawns, Thai curries and fruitshakes.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Seafood, curry, vegetables, mango shake are delicious

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Good food and nice views for sunsets

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Offers Thai seafood and western cuisine. Cooking class available.

Attraction.AttractionName: Phuket International Airport

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Turn right out of the airport. Follow the signs to road 402 (Thepkasattri Road). Turn left onto 402 and follow over the Sarasin Bridge. At first traffic light after the bridge turn left onto Highway 4. Follow the road for approximately 50 miles to Khuk Khak Beach. The JW Marriott Khao Lak Resort & Spa appears on the left hand side.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Book Air + Hotel and Get 30% Savings

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: When you book with Vacations by Marriott, your dreams of breathtaking beaches and unforgettable sunsets are just a click away. Enjoy fantastic savings of 30% and over! by booking air & hotel packages. Plus, Vacations by Marriott exclusively allows you to earn Marriott Rewards Points.Book now!

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Relax and rejuvenate after your hospital check up

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Extend your Thailand stay after your medical check up in the tranquility of the JW Marriott Khao Lak. Let our devoted team indulge you with the luxury of time and wellness, while orchestrating an elegant experience rooted in authentic Thai hospitality.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Make a wish, present a Naga’s wish coin and hand it over to make it come true.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Enjoy even more, with an upgrade to the Deluxe Pool Access Room category.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Enjoy culinary delights at our variety of restaurants with world cuisine.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Long haul wholesale business picking up. Still good opportunities for customers to receive competitive group rates in relation to Phuket.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Off season in Khao Lak. Great deals, value ads and bargains available for all segments, especially group! Occasionally, even the option of buying out the hotel exclusively for certain events can be discussed.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: High and Peak Season in Khao Lak. Excess demand and over average length of stays can be expected. Group proposals still occasionally possible. Pricing in similar area as Phuket.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Untouched nature, amazing beaches, variety of outdoor activities and aquamarine options. We regularly host corporate groups, incentives and especially team buildings as the setting we have available is basically unmatched anywhere in Thailand.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: FREE wireless high speed Internet in all guest rooms, meeting rooms and throughout the entire resort, yearround!

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Best beach in Khao Lak. Longest swimming pool in Southeast Asia (3.2km for 1 round), all ground floor rooms have direct pool access from their private terrace. Signature award winning Quan Spa at beachfront location, 15 treatment rooms.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: Hotel grounds and layout ideal for Corporate groups, weddings and especially team buildings. Recently elected "Thailand's best team building hotel" by Synergy Sports. Over 10 breakout rooms, most with daylight or at beachfront location.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: 1 hour drive from Phuket Airport, yet offering extremely attractive rates and values. Considered unspoiled and not over-commercialized. Longest swimming pool in Southeast Asia.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: The destination and hotel provide something out of the ordinary. Khao Lak is considered one of Thailand's last untouched destinations and is known for its authenticity. It is easy accessible by car or bus and is just 1 hours drive from Phuket Airport. The hotel was elected "One of the world's top new hotels" in 2010 and provides a unique luxury experience. Be it for a couples honeymoon, family vacation or corporate group, the JW Marriott Khao Lak has facilities suitable for every occasion. High speed Internet access is provided FREE in all guest rooms, meeting rooms, and throughout the entire resort. Other key selling points are the beautiful flat, sandy beach, Southeast Asia's longest swimming pool (3.2km) or beachfront meeting rooms with natural daylight and amazing views of the Andaman Sea. The hotel specializes in tailor made events like executive retreats and is highly successful with team building events. Khao Lak town has various shops, boutiques, bars, discotheques and restaurants available.
